Package dev.majek.pc.util

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Chat
    Class that handles all color codes (formatting/removing) within strings and parsing Strings into Components with fancy formatting like hover and click events.
    Chat.MiniJSON
    Handy in text formatting I call MiniJSON.
    Pair<A,​B>
    Stores two related values.
    ReflectionUtil  
    TabCompleterBase
    Allows for some static utility methods to be available to tab completer.
    TextUtils
    Provides utilities for a more complex text component formatting system.
    Utils
    Contains various unrelated utility functions.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    TimeInterval  
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    Chat.InvalidJSONException
    Thrown if there is invalid syntax in the JSON Object for Chat.format(JSONObject).
    Chat.InvalidMiniJSONException
    Thrown if there is invalid syntax in the Chat.MiniJSON object.
    TextUtils.SyntaxException
    Represents an exception encountered while parsing the syntax supported by this utility class.
